channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Broccoli cheese soup
item.description:
Broccoli cheese soup



In the world of cheaty foods, broccoli cheese soup has always seemed like one of the cheatiest. There's nothing wrong with owning it: Cheese is delicious, and not every single lunch has to be virtuous. Still, I sometimes wish that the broccoli part of the whole thing was taken a little more seriously, if only for the purely selfish reason that I love broccoli. My goal here was to create a recipe for broccoli cheese soup that was as comforting as the ultra-cheesy kind you typically find, but simultaneously really tasted like broccoli..

item.title: Vegetable tagine
item.description:
Vegetable tagine



Add some Moroccan flare to your mealtimes with this delicious tagine. Dried fruit is often used in this dish to offset the spices..

item.title: Veggie rice pot
item.description:
Veggie rice pot



Forget the takeaway and make your own Chinese special rice at home. You can add all sorts of other veg to this too, such as beansprouts, broccoli florets and baby corn..

item.title: Vegan chickpea tikka masala
item.description:
Vegan chickpea tikka masala



This delicious (and vegan!) chickpea tikka masala recipe hits the spot when you’re craving Indian food. Serve it up over rice and garnish with plenty of fresh cilantro!.

item.title: Veggie shepherd's pie with sweet potato mash
item.description:
Veggie shepherd's pie with sweet potato mash



The secret to this shepherd's pie’s filling is to choose big carrots so they don’t lose their texture when cooked.
